mapper.update: update qna set title=#{title}, content=#{content} , filename=#{filename, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, filepath=#{filepath, jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into qna(id, root, title, content, writer, filename, filepath) values (seq_qna.nextval, seq_qna.currval, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, #{filename, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filepath, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: select qna.*, (select member_name from tblmember where writer=tblmember.member_id) name from qna where id=#{id}

select n.*, (select writer from qna q where n.root=q.id) q_writer from (select rownum no, n.* , (select member_nickname from tblmember where writer=member_id) name from (select * from qna order by root, step desc) n order by no desc) n where no between #{beginList} and #{endList}
